section.heading: Destroying cemetery railing or tomb.
section.text: If any person shall maliciously cut down, demolish, or otherwise injure any railing, fence, or inclosure around or upon any cemetery, or shall injure or deface any tomb or inscription thereon, such person shall be fined not more than $100.

annotations.annotation: Wearing of masks for particular purposes, see § 22-3312.03.
Defacement of public or private building or property, see § 22-3312.01.
Burning of cross or other religious symbol, see § 22-3312.02.
